article:
Bob likes all kinds of weather.When it's sunny in summer,he usually sits under the tree.It's cool and he can _ books there.When he is tired ,he often lies on the grass and _ .In winter,he likes to sit in the sun when it's sunny, _ sunlight can make people healthy.
When it's raining,he likes listening to the sound of rain.He thinks it is the best _ in the world.When it is snowing,he likes walking in the _ .He often plays _ his friends outside.
When it is windy,he can also do something _ .He usually flies kites in the park in the light wind .He often watches the trees,the flowers and the grass _ in the wind when the wind is strong. _ can dance very well.He thinks the best dancers come from the wind.
